DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the cuff pressure between cylindrical and TaperGuard endotracheal tube during laparoscopic cholecystectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Cuff Pressure of TaperGuard and Cylindrical- Endotracheal Tube During Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty four participants were assigned to one of the two groups: cylindrical and TaperGuard endotracheal tube. At the supine position, cuff pressure of endotracheal tube was measured before and after abdominal insufflation in the supine position. After insufflation the head-up position (30Â°) was made and cuff pressure was recorded.
DOC.criteria: Participants who were underwent laparoscopic cholecystectomy with American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status 13 history with respiratory disease, difficult intubation, and morbid obesity (body mass index more than 35 kg/m2).
